alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Cass; Crow Wing; Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 8:14PM CDT until June 20 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Itasca County in north central Minnesota... Northwestern Aitkin County in east central Minnesota... East central Cass County in north central Minnesota... Northern Crow Wing County in east central Minnesota... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 813 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ironton, or 14 miles northeast of Brainerd, moving northeast at 50 mph. Trained spotters have reported widespread wind damage as the storm moved through Brainerd. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Swatara around 850 PM CDT. Hill City around 855 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lake Roosevelt, Waukenabo, Wolford, Cedar Lake, Washburn Lake, Little Pine, Riverton, Cuyuna Country State Park, Upper Mission Lake and White Elk Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. This storm is producing widespread wind damage across central Crow Wing county. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Duluth MN.
